title: Pregnancy Exercises Second Trimester | 30 Minute Pregnancy Workout (Safe For All Trimesters)

Disclaimer: This is general prenatal fitness only. Please check with your doctor or health care provider to see if this video is safe for you. You are responsible for your own safety. Don’t do anything that feels unsafe for you or baby. Stop if you have any pain or discomfort, bleeding, chest pain or shortness of breath, dizziness or if you feel unwell. P&P Health Inc., Pregnancy and Postpartum TV and Jessica Pumple are not liable in any way for any injury, loss, damages, costs or expenses suffered by you in relation to this video or its content. 


Jessica Pumple is a certified bariatric and diabetes educator, registered dietitian, and pre & postnatal fitness instructor.  She helps pregnant women stay fit, have healthy babies, and easier labors. She helps new moms with postpartum recovery, to heal and strengthen their core and lose the baby weight.

If you enjoy our content subscribe to our channel, hit the bell button, leave a comment, and share with your friends so I can make you more of the videos you enjoy!

channelDescription:
Passionate about spreading positivity, confidence and encouragement for a healthy and fit pregnancy, an easier delivery and fast recovery postpartum!

I have 400+ free pregnancy and postpartum workouts in many different styles: Yoga, HIIT, Pilates, Dance, Diastasis Recti Safe & More.

*Check out my Birth Education Playlist to create your positive and empowering birth experience.

*Heal and flatten your core after birth using my DIASTASIS RECTI Playlist.

I hope you find something helpful here on the channel and I’m so grateful to be able to share my passion and life with you!

Jessica Pumple
Registered Dietitian
Yoga & Fitness Instructor
Certified Pregnancy and Postpartum Core Exercise Specialist

Contact: support@pregnancyandpostpartumtv.com

comments: I crushed it! 16 weeks pregnant and this is my first workout since getting pregnant, first trimester was really tough but this made me feel amazing! Can’t wait to do it again 😊
I'm 22 weeks now and feels so good to do an exercise that makes me perspire again! Thanks!
🎉 My first workout since week 8 of pregnancy! I’m 15.5 weeks and first trimester left me sick and exhausted. It’s so nice to feel like I did some meaningful activity today!

I started this particular workout from my 6th month (since I failed my gtt ) and started losing weight since then ..now I'm in my 8th month and hasn't gained any since then (hopefully that normal) although doc said my baby is growing healthy..Alhamdulilah
This exercise definitely helped me alot with leg swelling and flexibility
❤❤❤

I crushed it !
28 weeks at 2 days today . And before pregnancy I worked out regularly I’ve been out the gym a few months and this is just what I needed just enough to push me but not over doing it. Worked me out well, paused the video between to give myself a little extra time to take a few extra more minutes to break and Ofcourse run to restroom . Lol .

Thank you ❤
